meanings.definition: The act of extending something beyond its normal limits.
meanings.sent1: Her overextensions of the truth made it hard to trust her.
meanings.sent2: The overextensions of the bridge caused it to collapse.
meanings.sent3: His overextensions of the truth in his stories always made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The overextensions of her imagination knew no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The overextensions of the rubber band finally led to it snapping.

meanings.definition: The state of being extended beyond its normal limits.
meanings.sent1: The tree's overextensions reached out to touch the sky.
meanings.sent2: The overextensions of the budget led to financial strain.
meanings.sent3: The cat's overextensions on the windowsill were quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The overextensions of the riverbanks caused flooding downstream.
meanings.sent5: The overextensions of the elastic waistband made it uncomfortable to wear.
